channel.title: Moparscape rsc priv server release date
channel.description:
All,
I am not quite sure who I should be addressing here, however it would be nice for the appropriate person to come forward and answer my questions.
Firstly, I am not sure if people are aware but many of the RSC community are eagerly awaiting the release of Moparscape RSC server. Secondly, RSC community desperately needs a decent server.
I do not think it is fair to continue with this stance of, " the server will be up when it is bug free etc"
There will be bugs with the server, like any other, but surely we can get on it and start leveling that 2x XP!!!
All I ask for is a release date, I don't think, as a dedicated RSC player, that is too much to ask!
Please help
Charles (The Best PK)

item.title: Moparscape rsc priv server release date
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Beta will be out pretty soon here, and much sooner if I don’t have to constantly reply to this same question.

Read full topic
